lines.text: Magnets have long been used for navigation
Key insight : Relationship of current, magnetic fields

secText:
Lesson:
1. Discuss the [OBJ:expsec_rm27:history of electric force].
2. Discuss the [OBJ:expsec_rm28:history of magnetic force].
3. Discuss the [OBJ:expsec_rm29:relationship] between the magnetic and electric force.
